IndexPage.title: Eco-friendly Products from Rich Flora of Uzbekistan
IndexPage.description: The land of the Silk Road, an ancient network of trade routes, was a place of cultural exchange and deep knowledge. Drawing upon Uzbekistan's rich historical heritage and a desire for innovation, a modern enterprise was established in 2018 in the heart of Central Asia. Its aim is to utilize environmentally friendly, natural local resources - flowers, leaves, peels, seeds, roots of wild medicinal plants, fruits, and vegetables.

Footer.office_address_value: 100100, Republic of Uzbekistan, Tashkent city, Yakkasaray district, Shota Rustaveli street, 53B
Footer.prod_address_value: 111305, Republic of Uzbekistan, Tashkent region, Parkent district, Karakalpakstan Markaziy MF
